name: Wack boi in space
description:
I have called this game "Wackboi in Space". Wackboi jumps and whacks enemies to destroy them.

There are three controls in the game

1. "Space": Jump

2. "A": Move Left

3. "D": Move Right

I have uploaded the Windows and the WebGL build.

I have made the following three modifications to the game.

1. Added three new levels to the game. 

Level 1: Easy level, jump over the enemy and get to the end.

Level 2: Jump over a pit of spikes

Level 3: Defeat the boss enemy

2. Added Spikey triangular figures  mechanics with eyes which damages the player no matter which angle the player jumps on the enemy

3. Added animation to Spikey figure eyes that changes color yellow, red, and white. Also scaled up the regular enemy to make it a boss and increased its hp.

The home page description has a screenshot of each level.
